zhousp wrote:
> hi,there
> 
> After upgrade to heritrix 0.11, heritrix give some error on the console:
> 
> ------------------------------------------------------------------
> 2004-6-15 15:35:46 org.archive.crawler.settings.CrawlSettingsSAXHandler$SimpleElementHandler endElement
> Waring: Unknown attribute 'max-fetch-attempts' in 'file:/J:/work/heritrix/ArchiveOpenCrawler/src/conf/profiles/Simple/order.xml', line: 97, column: -1
> 2004-6-15 15:35:46 org.archive.crawler.settings.CrawlSettingsSAXHandler$SimpleElementHandler endElement
> Waring: Unknown attribute 'max-fetch-attempts' in 'file:/J:/work/heritrix/ArchiveOpenCrawler/src/jobs/Simple-20040603081440437/order.xml', line: 100, column: -1
> ------------------------------------------------------------------


'max-fetch-attempts' is an obsolete setting for FetchHTTP, but was still
mentioned in the template/profile order, and will be in older job order
files.

If you load order.xml files with old settings, you will get this warning,
but it is harmless.

- Gordon @ IA
